
sigle least square on GPU form like Ax=b
A is m*r m varying from 500 to 2200 ,r set 0.1*m 
x is r*1 b is m*1   we do m times.

600*600 5.70476s
500*500 2.17048s
800*800 3.51592s
1200*1200 5.68153s
1500*1500 8.15086s
1800*1800 10.0296s
2000*2000 12.3435s

2200*2200 15.7497s

2100*2100 14.1462s
2200*2200 15.7177s

do 100 times
